attributes.details:
Introducing our The Great Wave off Kanagawa Leather Print Reproduction, a stunning piece of art that will transform your wall into a masterpiece.

Our prints are printed on high-quality eco leather, giving a unique texture and feel that is superior to traditional canvas.

Each print is handmade in Italy, ensuring the highest quality and durability.

Product Features:

* Eco-leather print
* Washable panels
* UV-resistant coating
* Stretched over polished pinewood frames
* Ready to hang
* Handmade in Italy
* Thickness of each product is 1" (2.5 cm)
attributes.title: The Great Wave off Kanagawa Leather Print Reproduction
